titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on railway car body shells of stainless steel designed for gallery type railway cars.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/23/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on railway car body shells of stainless steel designed for gallery type railway cars.
